library(toastui)
library(dplyr)
my_calendar_data <- read.table("./data/schedule_V2025.csv", header = T, sep = ',')

calendar(navigation = TRUE, defaultDate = Sys.Date()) %>%
  cal_schedules(my_calendar_data) %>%
  cal_month_options(
    startDayOfWeek  = 1, 
    narrowWeekend = TRUE
  ) %>% 
  cal_props(cal_demo_props())
